articles.description: It's good to remember The Last of Us on HBO is an adaptation of a video game, and not a copy of it.

articles.title: Data.ai: Mobile gaming had unexpected highs and lows in 2022 | VentureBeat
articles.description: Mobile gaming in 2022 has diminished in spending, but not in time spent, according to a new report by data.ai.

articles.description: Close out the 30th anniversary of Dream Land's most-famous resident with this GDC 2023 design session from developers Shinya Kumazaki and Tatsuya Kamiyama.

articles.caption: A look at Immutable X's 2023 gaming outlook

articles.description: Of the many companies in blockchain gaming, Immutable has emerged as one of the leaders, or at least survivors, in the emerging market. And it has an elevated role among blockchain platforms and so it can see more of the future. ImmutableX generated $87 million in non-fungible token (NFT) trading volume, 250% higher than last¬†[‚Ä¶]

articles.caption: A look at Tiny Colony to debut as a tower defense game on IMX
articles.title: Tiny Colony will debut as Web3 tower defense game on ImmutableX | VentureBeat
articles.description: Tiny Colony is launching soon on the ImmutableX blockchain platform today as a game where you build a colony with pixelated ants.
